A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A very boring episode of the Star Wars saga.  At no point during the viewing if this movie did I feel any sense of adventure or danger.  Anyone claiming to have been on the edge of their seat is either lying or lives a life so sheltered that anything other than staring at a computer screen is exciting. \n\nWhile some people are upset about the way the legacy characters were treated\, my biggest grip is I do not care one bit what happens to Rey\, Kylo\, Finn\, Poe or anyone else in this franchise.  Sorry Disney\, you lost a lifelong Star Wars fan.   The past two movies were not Star Wars movies.
